title: Front End Developer
description: Full-time position. Joined the Digital Engagement team to help create digital experiences that connect with users on their journey through our web properties. The Digital Engagement team is primarily focused on reaching a wide audience to build a grassroots movement of activists working to improve the open internet.
details: Formalizing our Figma design system in code with JavaScript and React components
Adding new templates and content types to the Foundation's CMS
Collaborating with the design team to implement UX/UI improvements

title: Web Developer/Game Developer
description: Full-time position. Participated in the full development lifecycle on the web-based game, “Axis & Allies 1942 Online”
details: Use web technology like Sass, Typescript and React to create UI components for online video game
Implement mockups and wireframes from designers to recreate common game views like main menus and player profiles
Automate iOS builds using Fastlane and Github Actions
Updating Confluence  documentation for existing codebase

title: Web Developer
description: A full-time position that provides software development for online educational games

Created mockups using Figma/Adobe Illustrator for rapid prototyping

title: Junior Consultant,Solution Developer
description: Full-time position that provides software development based primarily on the Microsoft platform to multiple clients.

Support solution architecture at both enterprise and project levels using Sharepoint and ASP.Net projects
Collaborate with designers and project managers to create front-end solutions and branding using Sass and Javascript Libraries (React, AngularJS, Jquery)

title: Programmer
description: Temporary Position developing desktop applications to aid a postdoctoral researcher experiments.
details: Developing a single page application that can be ported to a desktop application using Electron and Knockout JS
Develop User-friendly Software that can handle thousands of scientific records within multiple experiments
Creating an offline application that can parse and store the raw data from generated text files

title: Junior Web Developer
description: Part-time position that consists of coding at all levels of the application stack - database and SQL, application servers in python and django, and the front-end in HTML, CSS, and jQuery.

title: Junior Web Programmer

title: Helpdesk Consultant
